title: Center for American Progress
deleted: Since its inception, the center has assembled a group of high-profile senior fellows, among them:
* [[Lawrence Korb]], [[United States Assistant Secretary of Defense|Assistant Secretary of Defense]] under President [[Ronald Reagan]]
* [[Gene Sperling]], Director of the [[United States National Economic Council|National Economic Council]] under Presidents [[Bill Clinton]] and Barack Obama
* [[Ruy Teixeira]], [[political science|political scientist]] and author of ''The Emerging Democratic Majority''
* [[Tom Daschle]], former [[United States Senate Minority Leader|Senate Minority Leader]]

* [[Doug Jones (politician)|Doug Jones]], former Senator from [[Alabama]]<ref>{{Cite web|title=Sen. Doug Jones|url=https://www.americanprogress.org/about/staff/jones-doug/bio/|access-date=2021-10-08|website=Center for American Progress|language=en-US}}</ref>

* [[Lawrence Summers]], former Secretary of the Treasury<ref>{{Cite web|title=Lawrence H. Summers|url=https://www.americanprogress.org/about/staff/summers-lawrence/bio/|access-date=2021-10-08|website=Center for American Progress|language=en-US}}</ref>
* [[Elizabeth Edwards]], late wife of former presidential candidate and former U.S. Senator from North Carolina [[John Edwards]].
